column1: Accordingly, this Court is not bound to answer any question of law formulated by the Board of
Review and can hear and determine any questions of law arising on the Stated Case. I am of the
view  that  the  following  question  of  law  will  address  all  the  points  raised  by  the  Appellant

column2: Is  the  Appellant  entitled  in  terms  of  section  29(2)(b)  of  the  IRA  1979  to  deduct  trade
